Unit testing node using chai, mocha, sinon Mocha - most commom framework used for node.js testing This is simply a test runner.

Chai - Assertion library used along with mocha General usage: import ‘chai from ‘chai’ const expect = chai.expect // creat a short cut for expect import chaiAsPromised from ‘chai-as-promised’ chai.use(chaiAsPromised)

Sinon - mocking library most commonly used in JS

Gulp, Grunt - task runners
